cleanFiles

(
  • files
  • path
  • rename
  • clearPath
  • clearExt
)
private

Defined in lib/cleanFiles.js:3

Function used to clean the names in the required object

Parameters:

  • files Array

    An array containing all names that have been required

  • path Array | String

    The original path from where the files come from

  • rename Function

    A function that can be used to rename the files

  • clearPath Boolean

    Allow or not to clean the path inside the names

  • clearExt Boolean

    Allow or not to clean the extension inside the names

filterFiles

(
  • files
  • filter
  • whiteList
  • blackList
)
Array private

Defined in lib/filterFiles.js:3

Private method used to filter files.

Parameters:

  • files Array

    An array with the paths to filter.

  • filter Function

    A function used to filter those paths.

  • whiteList Array

    An array containing the allowed extensions.

  • blackList Array

    An array containing the denied extensions.

Returns:

Array:

An array with the filtered paths.

findFiles

(
  • path
  • recursive
)
Array private

Defined in lib/findFiles.js:4

Private method used to find files within the given path.

Parameters:

  • path String | Array

    A string or an array containing the path to search.

  • recursive Boolen

    If the search needs to be recusive or not.

Returns:

Array:

An array with all files found.

(
  • paths
  • engines
)
Object private

Defined in lib/requireFiles.js:3

Function used to require files based on engines and a list of paths.

Parameters:

  • paths Array

    An array with the paths to be required

  • engines Object

    An object with all engines used

Returns:

Object:

An object with the required files
